C

checkDirection(String) - Method in class mig.core.Room
Method to test if the direction given is in the validDirections list
checkKey(Key) - Method in class mig.core.Lock
Method for verifying that the key corresponds to the key compatible with the lock
checkPassword(String) - Method in class mig.core.Code
Private Method to test if the password given is the same as the password of the Bolt If the password given by the player is false, it returns an error message that tells the player the password is wrong
checkState() - Method in class mig.core.Bolt
Method to check if the bolt is locked or not
Chest - Class in mig.core
Chest is the class representing a chest with a bolt.
Chest() - Constructor for class mig.core.Chest
Default Constructor
close() - Method in class mig.core.Code
The complete method to lock a Code A code does not need to give the password to be closed
closed(Key) - Method in class mig.core.Lock
Method for closing the lock if the key is compatible with the lock
closeDoor(Key) - Method in class mig.core.Door
Method to close the Door with a key There is a test of the bolt, because only a Lock can be closed with a key If it is not the good class there will be an exception
closeDoor() - Method in class mig.core.Door
Method to close the Door without anything If it is not the good class there will be an exception There is a test of the bolt, because OpenedBolt and Code class can be closed without parameters
clues - Variable in class mig.core.Room
It is the list of items present in the Room This list does not contain null value
Code - Class in mig.core
Code is the class that creates a lock with a password to unlock it.
Code(String) - Constructor for class mig.core.Code
Default constructor
CodeTest - Class in test.core
JUnit test for the class Code
CodeTest() - Constructor for class test.core.CodeTest
 
Codetest() - Method in class test.core.CodeTest
default constructor for the test class CodeTest
containt - Variable in class mig.core.Chest
ArrayList of all items contained in this Chest A chest can contains a maximum of 4 items
currentRoom - Variable in class mig.core.Player
Is the current room where is the player
